is a small town near Barcelona.It has a population of 5000 people. It’s on the mountain although the beach is just 8 km away in

. It’s a quiet and beautiful town. It has a town centre, where there are almost all the shops, bars ands restaurants. In the town centre there is a church. Behind that there is Iglesia’s Avenue, where the people like walking and talking.

The weather is very different from Gavà, because we are at an altitude of 350m. The temperature in the winter can be about –5 degrees, while in Gava the temperature is always 4 o 5 degrees higher. The summer is very pleasant, it’s sunny but not usually too hot
Begues is an interesting village for the mountains that belong to Garraf Park, where most people come to hike.
